model_answer: The answer is A: [00:01:00 - 00:02:03]. The presenter demonstrates the built-in Photos app slideshow at time interval [00:01:00 - 00:02:03] in the video.

The correct answer is A: [00:02:03 - 00:02:56]. The tutorial mentions that after explaining how to add Screen Recording to Control Centre, the narrator will walk through the process of doing so visually by navigating Settings > Control Centre > Customise and tapping Screen Recording. This is followed by instructions on how to start the recording, capture a slideshow, stop it, and note where the video is saved.
